help.description: Claude Code Router CLI - Replace Claude Code's default AI provider with custom LLM providers

commands.title: Commands:
commands.start: start      Start the claude code router service
commands.stop: stop       Stop the claude code router service
commands.default: (default)  Show service status and start if not running

messages.stopSuccess: claude code router service has been successfully stopped.
messages.stopFailed: Failed to stop the service. It may have already been stopped.
